question: Identify the trends in IT investments among companies in the technology sector for the last year.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Extract data from the CompanyInfo table for companies in the technology sector, filtering for active records and their ITBudgets from the last year.","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":2,"task":"Retrieve relevant deal records from the CompanyDealMaster table that include contracts signed in the last year, focusing on deal values and signing dates.","table":["CompanyDealMaster"]},{"step":3,"task":"Analyze the CompanyITPartnerDetail table to identify partnerships and collaboration details linked to IT services or technology providers in the last year.","table":["CompanyITPartnerDetail"]},{"step":4,"task":"Aggregate and summarize findings on IT investment trends, focusing on total budget allocations and collaborations made in the technology sector for analysis.","table":["CompanyInfo","CompanyDealMaster","CompanyITPartnerDetail"]}]}
